item.title: No-ip help
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

IF you are looking to put your server up this is the two ways to host it;

No-ip:(The best one)

Go to: www.no-ip.org
Register using your email adress and create a password.
Then Click on “host” in the left navigation bar.
Create a host name e.g. pimpscape.
Then scroll down and click “create host”
Once you have done that, click download at the top.
Then select your format, e.g. windows.
Then save/download.
Once you have downloaded a new window should open up.
Log in on this window using the same details you used previously.
Then check the box left of your server ip e.g. pimpscape.no-ip.info
Then when you see a smiley face your server is now run on that ip.
Others can then Log on using that ip adress e.g. pimpscape.no-ip.info
In the future just find the program no-ip DUC and slect the box to use again.

Hamachi:

Go to: www.hamachi.cc
Simply click “download free” in the left navigation bar.
Next it should come up with having to
register, you don’t need to register at this.
Just skip it and click “Go to list of files”
Then slect your format e.g. windows, which is the top one, click “download”.
Then save/download.
Once you have downloaded just keep clicking next in the hamachi setup.( don’t forget to accept the licence agreement.
Next, just launch hamchi and click the “power on” button in the bottom left.
Create an account nickname e.g. your username, then click “ok”.
Click on “create or join networks” in the bottom right, first button.
Then chose the name of your server and a password.
People can join that server using that servername and password, and there you are, your srver is run on hamachi host.

Hope this helped, if not, pm me.

Read full topic
